title: Visual Learning Path for React.js Certification
description: This personalized learning path is designed for visual learners with no prior knowledge in React.js who aim to achieve certification. The path includes visual resources to facilitate understanding and progression.

milestones.title: Introduction to React.js
milestones.description: Understand the basics of React.js, components, and virtual DOM.
skills_gained: Basic understanding of React.js components and virtual DOM

milestones.title: State and Props in React.js
milestones.description: Learn about state management and props in React.js.

resources.title: React State and Props Visual Guide

skills_gained: Understanding of managing state and passing props in React.js

milestones.title: React.js Routing and Forms
milestones.description: Explore routing concepts and form handling in React.js.
skills_gained: Ability to handle forms using Formik

prerequisites: Basic understanding of programming concepts like variables, data types, and control structures
